Package game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
public class Player extends Actor
Class representing the Player. It implements the Resettable interface. It carries around a club to attack a hostile creature in the Lands Between. Created by:

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      In this class we are able to choose the class and we will check if the player's health is low enough to be called Death. If so, we will call death action.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
